price: Zar kad pomremo i zemlja postanemo!? Nezamisliv je to povratak!”
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗاۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجۡعُۢ بَعِيدٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban dhālika rajʿun baʿīdun
